channel.title: Angular Flex Layout Tutorial with examples on Angular Wiki
channel.description: Recent content in Angular Flex Layout Tutorial with examples on Angular Wiki

item.title: Angular flex layout basics
item.description: Angular flex layout features divided into two main categories Static API Responsive API Each API has its own directives or APIs which can be applied on flexbox container or flexbox child elements. In this section we will learn about basic flex layout directives Angular flex layout directives for flexbox containers The following API or directives are used on flexbox container fxLayout fxLayoutGap fxLayoutAlign fxLayout fxLayout is a directive used to define the layout of the HTML elements.
